title: Face: A Journey Beyond Time and Space
description: From Invercargill, New Zealand to India to Indraprasth, FACE takes you to places. A ghostly face A mysterious figure Seven Immortal Sages An Evil Queen And a girl's quest for love beyond time and space... A timeless love fable of Ciya and Avin is a journey beyond time and space.
author: Rucha Joshi
